participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: cheerful and creative, loves sharing her passion for music with others.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i am a piano teacher on the side. i play several instruments.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: energetic and practical, finds joy in both books and active pursuits.
participant_2.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.
